snippet.title: Beluflin Trailer
snippet.description:
https://giarosart.itch.io/beluflin

Beluflin is a game inspired by the NES classic, Binary Land. Here you control 4 fireflies at the same time as they change color to activate four switches in 10 minutes. There are 6 worlds with 5 stages each.

I created Beluflin in one month and made all the codes, art, interface, sounds, levels and concept.

The softwares I used are: Unity 3D, Microsoft Visual Studio, Autodesk Maya, Image-Line FL Studio, Adobe Flash and Adobe Photoshop.
